headline.print_headline: Spanish Protesters Riot in Madrid, 11 People Hurt
headline.main: Spanish Protesters Riot in Madrid, 11 People Hurt

docs.snippet: A Madrid demonstration in sympathy with protests in the northern Spanish city of Burgos against a local government plan to convert a street into a tree-lined boulevard turned violent on Wednesday, leading to 11 arrests and 11 injuries....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Madrid demonstration in sympathy with protests in the northern Spanish city of Burgos against a local government plan to convert a street into a tree-lined boulevard turned violent on Wednesday, leading to 11 arrests and 11 injuries.

headline.sub: Senate panel says Benghazi attack was preventable
headline.main: Senate panel says Benghazi attack was preventable

docs.snippet: The Senate Intelligence Committee says the attack on a U.S. diplomatic post in Benghazi on September 11, 2012 was preventable, but the State Department says there was "no specific threat." Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate Intelligence Committee says the attack on a U.S. diplomatic post in Benghazi on September 11, 2012 was preventable, but the State Department says there was "no specific threat." Gavino Garay reports.

headline.print_headline: World May Have to Suck Gases From Air to Meet Climate Goals-U.N.
headline.main: World May Have to Extract Gases From Air, U.N. Says

docs.snippet: Governments may have to extract vast amounts of greenhouse gases from the air by 2100 to achieve a target for limiting global warming, a draft U.N. report showed on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Governments may have to extract vast amounts of greenhouse gases from the air by 2100 to achieve a target for limiting global warming, a draft U.N. report showed on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Central Africa Republic Religious Hatred Was Underestimated: France
headline.main: Central Africa Republic Religious Hatred Was Underestimated: France

docs.snippet: The level of hatred in Central African Republic between Muslims and Christians has been underestimated and is creating a "nearly impossible" situation for African Union and French forces to combat, France's U.N. envoy said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The level of hatred in Central African Republic between Muslims and Christians has been underestimated and is creating a "nearly impossible" situation for African Union and French forces to combat, France's U.N. envoy said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Internet Access Ruling Raises Netflix Worries
headline.main: Internet Access Ruling Raises Netflix Worries

docs.snippet: Netflix's Internet video service thrives on drama and suspense, but not the kind triggered by a legal ruling that threatens to affect the company's growth and pricing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Netflix's Internet video service thrives on drama and suspense, but not the kind triggered by a legal ruling that threatens to affect the company's growth and pricing.
